Posts.Content: LilliBell wrote: I had my 1st mamo in mid November 2011, I was called back for an ultrasound, after the ultrasound I was told It showed some suspcious spot but I should  wait 6 months to repeat it, I decided to go to a womns breast center and get a second opinion , the center repeated the ultrasound and confirmed it did  show an area of concern, I am scheduled for a biposy on January 6, 2011. I cant eat , sleep, think straight and I cry so much, all I can think about are my kids that is what aI live and breath for, My thoughts are tormenting me, I dont know what to do!!!     ~Help~ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lord help me, I am so afraid! LilliBell liveit56
